name: Integrate planner role into workflow
description: Replace worker role with dedicated planner role in the PLAN phase of the chore workflow. Update TMUX dispatcher to create planner panes instead of worker panes during PLAN status, modify context passing to use CHORE_ROLE=PLANNER, and update pane naming to show 'planner' instead of 'worker' for planning phase.

name: Add sub-chore support to Chore class
description: Extend Chore class to support parent-child relationships. Add methods for creating, linking, and managing sub-chores. Update status progression to handle sub-chore dependencies.

name: Create ChoreDecomposer class
description: Implement the decomposition logic using the prompt templates. Add methods to analyze codebase context and generate sub-chores. Include validation for the four quality criteria (specificity, context constraint, containment, stability). Ensure ChoreDecomposer uses build_chore_planner_prompt from chore_prompts.py for consistent prompt generation following the established pattern.

name: Create ChoreReviewer class
description: Implement review logic using the review prompt template. Add evaluation methods for each quality criterion. Provide structured feedback and approval/rejection workflow.

name: Update ChoreRepository for hierarchical operations
description: Add CRUD operations for sub-chores. Implement queries for parent-child relationships. Add methods to find chores by decomposition status.

name: Integrate planner prompts into workflow
description: Store prompt templates in the system. Add configuration for when to trigger decomposition. Update status transitions to include planning review phases. Create build_chore_planner_prompt function in chore_prompts.py following the same pattern as build_chore_worker_prompt and build_chore_reviewer_prompt. Add generate_planner_prompt function in context_prompts.py matching the idiom of generate_worker_prompt and generate_reviewer_prompt.

name: Add tests for decomposition and review functionality
description: Test sub-chore creation and linking. Validate quality criteria enforcement. Test hierarchical chore operations. Add test_planner_prompt_generation to test_comprehensive.py following the pattern of test_worker_prompt_generation and test_reviewer_prompt_generation.
